articles.author: Kerry  Breen
articles.title: South Africa helicopter crash blamed on penguin in cardboard box that hit pilot's controls - CBS News
articles.description: The pilot and three passengers aboard the helicopter, as well as the penguin, were uninjured, according to an incident report.
articles.content:
A pilot and three passengers were not injured after their helicopter crashed from a low altitude in South Africa, according to an incident report. 
An unsecured cardboard box holding a penguin cause… [+2409 chars]
